Introduction

Kim Seokjin, known under his stage name Jin, is a South Korean singer-songwriter, composer, and producer under Big Hit Entertainment and HYBE Labels. He is best known as one of the vocalists and visuals of the worldwide sensational boy group BTS.

Jin was just walking down a street when he was spotted by a casting agent and was invited to audition for Big Hit Entertainment. With a head-turner presence, sweet vocals, and acting education, Jin became a trainee alongside his fellow members. Eventually, Jin debuted with the group and went on to become one of the most famous artists of his generation.

Jin’s first official single ”The Astronaut”, released in 2022 became his first solo entry on the Billboard Hot 100 Chart. It was also named one of the best songs of 2022 by Rolling Stone.
